summary: Fixes Telvanni Robes that would only give female access to Ildari\'s texture.
descriptionHtml:
REQUIRES DRAGONBORN

As I was playing Skyrim, I loved how the Telvanni Robes looked, but was disappointed that, as I was playing a female character, I would only be able to use Ildari\'s robes that had that ugly heart stone thing on it. So, I set out to fix this.

Here\'s what I did:
-Renamed Ildari\'s version of the robes to \"Ildari\'s Telvanni Robes\"
-Made it so where Neloth will sell the actual Telvanni Robes as well as the Telvanni Boots.

NOTE:
I did NOT change any item in the game, with the exception of renaming Ildari\'s robes to make it less confusing.
author: p0xus
